website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for the most environmentally friendly option out there, these all natural shopping bags are hard to beat. Smaller size works well for quick weekday trips to the store.
pros: Natural, unbleached cotton construction is fully biodegradable
Blank exterior can easily be customized
Holds a good deal without being unnecessarily bulky
cons: Some shrinking can be expected with the first wash
If you need bags for heavy loads, consider our other picks

customer_reviews.title: More like muslin bags, not canvas.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my idea of canvas is different from other folks. 5.5 ounce canvas looks s great deal like muslin fabric and doesn't look like any type of canvas I have ever seen. Most canvas is some type of basket weave, if this is, I could not see it. These are lightweight fabric bags. If you write on them with a permanent marker they will bleed right through to the back, not a dense heavy canvas.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love making Library bags. These are sturdy and can be crafted on. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra F.

customer_reviews.title: A Picture Is Worth A Thousand Words
customer_reviews.text: Here's my issue with the bags. In the picture where the girl has the bag over her shoulder I am 100% convinced that a larger bag was used. These bags are a good sturdy material, but I had no idea I would have to SQUEEZE items into the bag. The ad says 16 x 15. It's actually 14 1/2. Not a big deal there. But I really have an issue with that deceptive seeming picture. Otherwise I have nothing bad to say about the bag. I did consider returning them because of this. Who wants small bags to go food shopping with?
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Used for givewaway bags
customer_reviews.text: Used these during a company give away - they had a lot of stuff in them and held up very well. They are slightly see through but gave us absolutely no issues while using. Can't even tell unless you're holding one side up to the light. I even ironed on our logo and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Hardenstine

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to send these back because I did not receive all I was supposed to. I believe I was 3 short. I ended up keeping them, and I am really glad I did. I do wish they would have counted better or would have been able to send me what I was missing. But that was not an option. I think because I bought them in “good used condition”-the ones I received were great. And they were not used, just repacked. But they left some out at my expense.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3wifeof1:)

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great quality. I was compleated impressed!! Definitely will.be buying them again. They actually came in many more colors than shown in the picture. It was actually a happy surprise for me. I was expecting these colors but they showed up with some the colors shown along with yellows, blues, green and many more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is as advertized
customer_reviews.text: They are not bulky, nice handle length. They do not take up much room. I keep them in my car for hand access.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifting!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have insanely high expectations for these to be honest, so I was REALLY surprised when I got them. They’re perfect!! The bags came bundled in a cute & convenient wrapped cube. They’re your average tote. Perfect for crafting and gifting. I’m using mine to embroider on and it’s going great. Def recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: fion

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy reusable bags.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very sturdy and a good size for grocery shopping - love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed the bags material and size
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed, I bought 50+ of these bags before because I draw on them and sell, and recently I bought about 50 all together at once and the quality definitely changed. It’s more thin, see through, and the handles are WAY shorter. I have so many orders right now and I can’t believe they would change these bags, i’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for embroidery too!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to do my embroidery on. I was skeptical because i seen people for vinyl on theirs that I was nervous I wouldn't get great results. Boyy was I wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and variety
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and good variety! I like the lightweight and sturdy cotton as I am using these as freebies for customer orders. I ironed them and used dark fabric heat transfer paper to apply my logo and feel they look professional and far more expensive than the $1.50 each that they cost.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great- just what I was looking for. Only issue was that they didn’t wash super well but for the price, otherwise they were very good and just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: The size worried me. I didn’t to be. It’ll be good size for carrying groceries instead of plastic bags that rip holes causing for items to all out
customer_reviews.author: J. Laden

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome overall I just wish it would be a little bit bigger, for groceries you'll need more than 2 if you get medium-sized things like cereal milk or other boxes and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Dalgis cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags for crafting. They are very sturdy but not to thick. Light weight but can hold a good bit. Great for personalized gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: ButGod

customer_reviews.title: Great to personalize, sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: I personalized these bags with vinyl and they turned out great. They have held together nicely even with heavy items in them. Great product for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: packaged reallly nicely!!! thick study great for the price!! would for sure order more used for party favors
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Girl Scout troop. We painted a flower on one side and our troop number on the other. Very happy with these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I used them to make personalized iron-transfer bags (which was a challenge/quite difficult but doesn’t count against the function of the bag).
customer_reviews.author: Solomon Adair

customer_reviews.title: Great but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags for a craft project. They seem very sturdy. It is a nice weight canvas. My only complaint is that they shrink A LOT when you wash them. I would wash them before doing anything craft related with them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Horn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bags
customer_reviews.text: Made shopping bags out of these. Great for heat transfer vinyl and given as gifts! I will order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price !! The material is study and size is good. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: milci

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Light but sturdy, I use with my walker to carry items like mail, shopping etc. Works very well
customer_reviews.author: steele

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to use as car trash bags. Hang them by the handles over the headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Seem really sturdy and durable. I Applied htv with no issue
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Small areas of staining
customer_reviews.text: Three of the five bags arrived with some small areas of staining. Will be placing in the wash to try and get it out. Other than that, they will work for the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Name not found

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with my purchase. Well made, sturdy, nice colors, perfect size. The only draw back is that the bottoms of the bags aren't flat.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Generous size (compared to plastic bags at grocery stores)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to reduce plastic waste. These will be used as shopping bags. I especially like that I can wash them...
customer_reviews.author: M S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: never enough bags
customer_reviews.text: I stencil on the bags and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Light bag but great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for personalized teacher gifts! Have to admit hands down very good quality for such a light bag! I used iron-on vinyl and It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than other canvas bags. They hold what I need. Great for groceries, shopping, dry cleaning, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used these as a craft at my daughter's birthday. The girls loved decorating them. They are a good size and were great to decorate on. I would suggest putting a small piece of cardboard inside while decorating though so it doesn't bleed through the other side.
customer_reviews.author: missyjune37

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! We purchased them as our gift bags for our wedding! They’re a great size, love the colors, and they’re nice material!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color Variety and Size
customer_reviews.text: I love these, got the 20 pack have every color to go with every outfit. Amazing Material, Perfect Size, beautiful colors, 100% Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Jedina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these bags. I've struggled with finding bags that are durable for putting groceries in and these are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color choices. Great value. Lightweight. Definitely seems to be a light use item. Vinyl lettering works great on these too!
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the bags yet. They see. To be what I was looking g for the project that I will be doing.
customer_reviews.author: LaJuana

customer_reviews.title: They shrink bad.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for grocery shopping, but after washing they're now too small to hold anything.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: I hope they work.
customer_reviews.text: I am going to use it with Kindergarten to take home computer and charger every night. I start tomorrow. They seem sturdy, and I sure hope they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Markwood

customer_reviews.text: Bought this so i can use one bag per workday and toss it in the washer, however, it would shrink and i need to iron. Plus the handle is too long for shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Ria A

customer_reviews.title: Tote
customer_reviews.text: When I received the totes I was happy because it was the size I was looking for. But when I washed it the tote shrunk. Will I repurchase it? No.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, beautiful colors, great material, lovely colors. Will definitely recommend and order more!
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Great for Girl Scouts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed them for. They are roomy and not as slim as I was worried they would be.
customer_reviews.author: kristi rosz

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: these were nice but kinda thin. still like them but wish they were a little thicker
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love but missing 😢
customer_reviews.text: I really truly love the bags and the quality but I am missing 3 bags 😢😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Davian RM Indalecio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect selection
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of colors, perfect for my crafting project for teacher gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: The order was short
customer_reviews.text: It says you get 12 bags...I only received 11. Handles are to long
customer_reviews.author: Wade Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craft bags or bags for general use
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I bought these bags to decorate. I can do so many different appliqué designs on it. And the bags are strong enough to use in a variety of ways. I’ll probably use them for groceries. I’ll also use it as a diaper bag and gym bag. These bags are wonderful. I wouldn’t change anything about them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. BSA

customer_reviews.title: Great tote bags for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Perfect for cricut or other crafting they aren't the best tote bags but for the price and quantity you get I think its great.
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for my project. I've added custom iron-on decals made on my Silhouette Cameo and they will be used as bags for some of my more expensive glass pieces that I make. The colors are nice and they aren't too fancy or expensive like other bags I've bought. I'll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and great for customizing. I wish it was a flat bottom bag but I am really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shamona M. Nero

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to do hand embroidery on, they're the perfect thickness for my projects and they're well made which is super important. Great colors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Allison B.

customer_reviews.title: Those handles though!
customer_reviews.text: These things have a long handle! Like, really long, I'm six feet tall and they could still be dragging on the ground if I let them hang at full length, you could probably swing them around ninja style were you of the want. Other than that they seem study enough and well stitched.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Prefect

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to press on material
customer_reviews.text: The price was worth it, the color was needed because I customize totes... it has plenty of room but it wasn’t sturdy at all, if you’re looking for something light weight then this is what you need. I’m not sure about the durability but I’ll find out from my customers soon! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags ! I got them to paint things on - they’re terrific ! Highly recommend this seller. Thank you so very much :)

customer_reviews.title: Works great for quick run, baby,or everyday hand bagsbags
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these bag twice. They are perfect store run, or carry around bags. They are not bulky or heavy. I heat pressed them with different things, and they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The are thin for canvas but I was still very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Webb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to customize as gifts
customer_reviews.text: I customized with iron on vynil and gave them out for Christmas presents. Iron on material stayed on quickly. I wish I had kept one to see how long they lasted.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This tote bags are perfect for transfer paper projects. They are lightweight. Color is Natural and beautiful. Beautiful bags for my Etsy shop! MbTotesCreations!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: My mother wanted some bags for diy Christmas gifts and everyone loved these.

customer_reviews.text: Completed my yuppy status (LOL). I love reducing the plastic waste with these.

customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used them for gift bags and they were a hit!

customer_reviews.title: So much bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to tie-dye and give as gifts. They were perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Love them!

product_meta.title: Green Atmos 5 pack 15 X 16 inch with 27 inch long handle reusable grocery bags 5.5 oz cotton canvas tote eco friendly super strong washable great choice for promotion branding
product_meta.description: Color:Natural| Item Package Quantity:5Tote Green 5.5 oz 5 pack cotton reusable grocery bag, size 15 inch x 16 inch with long 27 inch handle big enough to go over your shoulder easily. Tote Green cotton bags are excellent quality made from a thicker 5.5 oz material with long cotton shoulder length handles that are sewn into the top edge securely holding the handles in place. Tote Green bags are suitable for digital, screen print, embroidery, fabric paints and personalized craft purposes. Tote Green cotton bags can offer the opportunity to make a eco friendly statement about green living through promotions and advertisement by retailers and organizations. Thank you for reading and please contact us if you need any further information.
feature_bullets: Tote Green bags are produced with natural unbleached cotton fabric, eco friendly raw natural finish, economical alternate for harmful plastic bags
Tote Green bags are made from 5.5 oz 100% natural cotton fabric
Size : 15” x 16”. handle length :27”, Decoration Area : 14” x 15”
Tote Green bags are suitable for Screen Print, Embroidery, Fabric Paints and personalized craft purposes
Tote Green cotton bags are super strong and durable and can be used as shopping bags and can also be used for day to day use such as carrying books etc

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars389 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
